name: chronicity
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact that something such as pain or an illness is chronic (= continues for a long time): Hypercalcemia can vary in severity and in chronicity. Treatment may depend on the chronicity of the pain.
More examplesFewer examplesGiven the chronicity and severity of many children's behaviour problems and the costs to the individual, the family, and society, early intervention is important.There were differences between the patients studied in the severity or chronicity of their illness.She believes her healthcare insurance application was refused because of the chronicity of her pain.Her depression is very much related to her underlying physical illness and its chronicity.
